help-all: Listing all top-level commands and groups. Specify a command to see more information.
help-group-standalone: This group is a standalone command.
streaming-added: **[+]** Stream with a goal `{0}` was added for processing in the channel {1}.
streaming-removed: **[−]** Stream with a goal `{0}` was removed from processing in the channel {1}.
streaming-required-channel:
The channel name is a required parameter.
To get full help for the command, send `{0}`.
streaming-required-goal:
The stream goal is a required parameter.
To get full help for the command, send `{0}`.
streaming-help-open: Start broadcasting a part of the stream in the channel. Works only in #moderators.
streaming-help-close: Stop broadcasting a part of the stream in the channel. Works only in #moderators.
streaming-help-channel: the channel that is available to you in which the broadcast must be done.
streaming-help-goal: the page title (with \_ for spaces) or namespace number (in <>).
